scripts.clean: rm -f -R node_modules && npm run clean:zkey && npm run clean:circuits && npm run clean:contracts
scripts.build:circuit:compile:claim: rm -rf build/circuits/claimVesting && mkdir -p build/circuits/claimVesting && circom circuits/claimVesting.circom --json --wasm --r1cs -o build/circuits/claimVesting && mv build/circuits/claimVesting/claimVesting_constraints.json build/circuits/claimVesting/claimVesting.json && snarkjs info -c build/circuits/claimVesting/claimVesting.r1cs
scripts.build:circuit:compile:revoke: rm -rf build/circuits/revokeVesting && mkdir -p build/circuits/revokeVesting && circom circuits/revokeVesting.circom --json --wasm --r1cs -o build/circuits/revokeVesting && mv build/circuits/revokeVesting/revokeVesting_constraints.json build/circuits/revokeVesting/revokeVesting.json && snarkjs info -c build/circuits/revokeVesting/revokeVesting.r1cs
scripts.build:circuit:compile: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile:claim && npm run build:circuit:compile:revoke
scripts.build:circuit:setup:claim: snarkjs plonk setup build/circuits/claimVesting/claimVesting.r1cs build/pot_final.ptau build/claim_final.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/claim_final.zkey build/verification_claim.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup:revoke: snarkjs plonk setup build/circuits/revokeVesting/revokeVesting.r1cs build/pot_final.ptau build/revoke_final.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/revoke_final.zkey build/verification_revoke.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npm run build:circuit:setup:ptn && npm run build:circuit:setup:claim && npm run build:circuit:setup:revoke
scripts.build:circuit:contract:revoke: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/revoke_final.zkey contracts/circuits/RevokeVerifier.sol && sed 's/PlonkVerifier/RevokeVerifier/g' contracts/circuits/RevokeVerifier.sol > tmp.sol && mv tmp.sol contracts/circuits/RevokeVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:contract:claim: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/claim_final.zkey contracts/circuits/ClaimVerifier.sol && sed 's/PlonkVerifier/ClaimVerifier/g' contracts/circuits/ClaimVerifier.sol > tmp.sol && mv tmp.sol contracts/circuits/ClaimVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:contract: mkdir -p contracts/circuits && npm run build:circuit:contract:claim && npm run build:circuit:contract:revoke
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:contract
scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract
scripts.flat: npx truffle-flattener contracts/ETHTornado.sol > ETHTornado_flat.sol && npx truffle-flattener contracts/ERC20Tornado.sol > ERC20Tornado_flat.sol
